dcsd.description: Apple diagnostic cable from the factory

dfu.description: Casues the Hydra/Tristar to assert the FORCE_DFU pin

kanzi_swd.description: Apple Kanzi cable in SWD single wire debug

kanzi_swd_astris.description: Apple Kanzi cable in SWD single wire debug with Astris running

kong_swd_astris.description: The ID presented by a Kong cable to enter serial wire debug with Astris running

reset.description: Causes the Hydra/Tristar to pull the device through reset
